mapper.sql: id, weapon_id, weapon_endurance_percent, weapon_match_percent, weapon_install_state, weapon_status, pet_id, use_id, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into pet_weapon_concat (id, weapon_id, weapon_endurance_percent, weapon_match_percent, weapon_install_state, weapon_status, pet_id, use_id, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weaponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weaponEndurancePercent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weaponMatchPercent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weaponInstallState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weaponStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update pet_weapon_concat
weapon_id = #{weaponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weapon_endurance_percent = #{weaponEndurancePercent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weapon_match_percent = #{weaponMatchPercent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weapon_install_state = #{weaponInstallState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weapon_status = #{weaponStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pet_id = #{petId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_id = #{useId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pet_weapon_concat set weapon_id = #{weaponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weapon_endurance_percent = #{weaponEndurancePercent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weapon_match_percent = #{weaponMatchPercent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weapon_install_state = #{weaponInstallState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weapon_status = #{weaponStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pet_id = #{petId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_id = #{useId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t_c.id, t_w.weapon_id AS weaponId, t_w.weapon_name AS weaponName, t_w.weapon_img AS weaponImg, t_w.weapon_demand_level AS weaponDemandLevel, t_w.weapon_rare_degree AS weaponRareDegree, t_w.weapon_description AS weaponDescription, t_c.weapon_endurance_percent AS weaponEndurancePercent, t_c.weapon_match_percent AS weaponMatchPercent, t_c.weapon_install_state AS weaponInstallState, t_c.pet_id AS petId, t_c.use_id AS useId FROM pet_weapon_concat t_c LEFT JOIN pet_weapon t_w ON t_c.weapon_id = t_w.weapon_id WHERE t_c.del_flag = '0' AND t_w.del_flag = '0' AND t_c.weapon_install_state = '1' AND t_c.weapon_status = '0' AND t_c.pet_id = #{petId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
